Sinopse: Napoleon (AKA Muffin) hears wild dogs howling from his Sydney home and wants to go out to the wild Australian wilderness to join the pack. He climbs into a basket attached to balloons and finds himself off on the adventure of a lifetime along with his new found friend Birdo the galah. On a long journey of self discovery and crazy adventures Napoleon finds himself in a multitude of situations leading him to find who he truly is.
